name: Peggy Sealfon
what_you_do: Board Certified Health Coach and Personal Development Coach who guides clients to transform their lives through a proprietary coaching system called Mind Body Fitness for Life.
who_you_serve: Individuals looking to improve their career, relationships, health, personal growth, or expand their spirituality, including those dealing with stress and anxiety.
signature_programs: Mind Body Fitness for Life, Escape From Anxiety (book), Awakening: A Novel (book), The Zero Stress Zone (book), The Change (book), Resilience Revolution: Building Unstoppable Mental Toughness (class), 14-Day Challenge: Improve Life, 3 Minutes to Destress (free audio), Restorative Breath Meditation
business_focus: Empowering and inspiring clients to live authentic, fulfilling lives through health coaching, personal development, and mind-body wellness strategies.
service_provided: Health coaching, personal development coaching, life coaching, mind body fitness coaching, meditation guidance, motivational speaking, wellness products
